Posts.Content:
So I get a letter from my mammogram office and it says that I have dense breast and that is why I need to come back. The gal that called me said that I had a mass on the right side and needed to come back. So I am not sure what to expect NOW ! I mean, I feel a little bit better about
 now, but still am worried.
Lora
just so nervous and anxious

Posts.Title: mammorgram call back - first mammogram at 43

Posts.Content:
HI everyone - 
I had my first mammogram yesterday and they have already called me back to (4/1/15) of all days ! she said they say a little mass on my right side and wanted to do another mammogram and diagnostic ultrasound. 
I am trying not to let anxiety get the best of me, since having to wait until next Tuesday 4/7/15.. they did say that it is not unusual to get a call since they do not have something to go by since it will be my first mammogram to compare it too. 
help ! i need some guidance and reassurance 
Thank you - 
llove6
